column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last month I went on a trip to Mexico .
#id=2
#text=I was excited because I had never been to Mexico or flown on a plane before and I was going to get to do both .
#id=3
#text=I booked my flight months in advance to be sure I would have transportation to my vacation destination .
#id=4
#text=The day I was about to leave I went to the airport hours in advance because I was nervous and excited .
#id=5
#text=I checked in at the correct terminal where the flight was supposed to leave from .
#id=6
#text=A nice lady checked my ticket and confirmed that my flight was on schedule .
#id=7
#text=I then proceeded to the security check station where officers checked my bags and personal belongings .
#id=8
#text=After the quick screening and a short wait my plane boarded .
#id=9
#text=I found my seat next to the window and was full of excitement .
#text=After some short instructions the plane taxied the runway and then sped up in a flash .
#text=I watched as the tires left the ground and we took to the sky .
#text=After several hours in the air the plane descended and touched down on a runway in Mexico .
#text=I was excited to get my vacation started .
